main event: Ten observers in an automobile observed a bright white light approaching while driving on the Northeast Extension of the Pennsylvania Turnpike.
interesting points: The light appeared to hover before moving rapidly across the sky,It was estimated to be about the size of a basketball and 1000 feet above the ground,The observation lasted between 5 to 10 minutes,The report was associated with Project Blue Book due to prior investigations,No further investigation was considered necessary according to the report.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: the driver and nine passengers in the automobile
